rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. The digits in each marked row or column are in exactly the same cyclic sequence wrapped around the grid.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. The digits in each marked row or column are in exactly the same cyclic sequence wrapped around the grid.
